plot: Soledad is a very lonely woman who falls into a big depression where she'll find a series of dreams in which she slowly transforms in to fire. She will try her best to escape from both dreams and reality, finding another state of mind.
title: Soy Fuego
plot_es: Soledad is a very lonely woman who falls into a big depression where she'll find a series of dreams in which she slowly transforms in to fire. She will try her best to escape from both dreams and reality, finding another state of mind.
